title: Add missing requested rooms to the admin area

requirements.text: Audit the set of requested admin "rooms" against the currently registered admin routes and admin navigation items, and add any missing rooms so that every requested room is reachable via a working route and visible in the Admin menu without breaking existing room routes.

quotes: Add more rooms if any rooms requested are missing.

acceptanceCriteria: A documented list exists in code (or in the PR description) mapping each requested room name to its route.
Every requested room has a corresponding route registered in `frontend/src/App.tsx` and an entry in `frontend/src/constants/adminNav.ts` (unless explicitly noted as intentionally excluded).
Navigating to each requested room route renders a page (not a blank screen) and does not throw console errors.

requirements.text: If there is no dedicated "Rooms" landing page for admins, add an admin-access-guarded page at `/admin/rooms` that shows a responsive grid/list of cards linking to each admin room (using the admin nav items as the source of truth) so admins can access all rooms from one place.

quotes: Add more rooms if any rooms requested are missing.

acceptanceCriteria: `/admin/rooms` exists, is wrapped by `AdminRouteGuard`, and is accessible from the Admin menu.
The page lists all admin room links derived from `frontend/src/constants/adminNav.ts` (label + icon + route), and each link navigates correctly.
Layout is responsive (mobile + desktop) with no overlapping text/images and no horizontal overflow.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing UI components only).
Do not modify immutable hook files: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Keep backend architecture as a single Motoko actor; do not add additional canisters.
nonGoals: Adding new backend data models or persistence for rooms.
Implementing real-time features (e.g., WebSockets) for rooms.
Adding third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity.
